google_play_reviews.content: love it
conversations as target from Android sharing dialog?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello. "share to Nextcloud Talk" is now possible. Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: app looks like kind of beta version from 2009, like some lowcost side project, probably it is...
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello. The development of the app is now continuously improved. Please report missing features or bugs here or at https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/issues
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: Nothing would make me happier than changing my review for the app when the feature of sending/sharing something that's not yet on Nextcloud but on my device is implemented. Until then we can not use it. To be fair we can use it to have a call and use another app to share files which is suboptimal. Please, consider it. It can be a simple as "upload new" functionality of Nextcloud.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello. "Share to Nextcloud Talk" is now possible as well as uploading files from inside the app with the attachment button.
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: We love it.
The file names aren't visible on my phone. Huawei Mate 20 Pro.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
please update to the latest version and see if the problem still exists.
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: why there is no option to directly attach file from phone ?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, you can now share local files with the attachment icon or by "share to Nextcloud Talk". Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: Great app. Never have any connectivity issues running on my Ubuntu home server. Docking one star for not having more qol and asthetic/gui features that are more standard these days and because of the lack of reliability for notifications. But it's getting there! Last update was great!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Nick,
we focused on UI and missing features in the last months.
The reliability of notifications are one of our next steps.
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: You can't start a dm...

I installed the Nextcloud snap on an Ubuntu 20.04 VM, and placed it behind a reverse proxy on my LAN. As others have stated, I do not reliably get notifications for either chats, or calls. Also had the grant access error that another poster described, and I am not able to send/receive voice or video when either of the connecting clients are outside my LAN. The "grant access" problem was a server setup issue that I fixed by modifying the server's config.php. I'm guessing the voice/video issue is also a server setup issue, but I have not figured it out yet. I am very excited about the nextcloud talk feature, and while annoyed at my ability to get the server configured, I don't want to give a low rating on this app for those issues. I am hoping though, that the app notification issues can be ironed out in the near term.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
thanks for the feedback. We are aware of problems with the notifications and will have a closer look soon.
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: He tenido problemas en varios tel√©fonos a la hora de recibir las notificaciones del chat y de las llamadas entrantes (2 Samsung [1 J2, 1 J7], con Android 6 y 7 respectivamente) . Es una pena, espero que puedan solucionarlo.
Sweet app

Text and voice seems to work well, but I'm having problems getting video to work properly. Video from a mobile device comes through distorted in the web app on a laptop. Also, it lacks the ability to take and share pictures with the mobile device camera in chat, and share on-device files not in nextcloud. Note - this is a review for the mainline app. I briefly tried the beta app, and then started having notification problems, and inability to join calls between a mobile device and the web app.
Works great! Zoom no longer needed.. Thanks guys!

Very poor app... whenever I log into my I'd blank page shows up with just a loading sign and after that nothing really shows up i had contacts as well as messages but they don't show up anywhere also it's so dumb app that it doesn't allow me to do anything!
No notifications which renders a messaging app rather useless. This app could be so much more, but somehow fails at critical keystone functionality. Welcome to software dev in 2020 everyone.
Not an independent app. Works only when nextcloud app is working. Hope to get "delivered" and "read" status, in next version.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The latest version ships sent and read status and also brings many other new features.

google_play_reviews.content: Most nextcloud software is really good. This one might be good after they iron out the clunkiness and add functionality to upload phone files.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, uploading files is now possible.
Best regards, Marcel

google_play_reviews.content: it has potential, but it is not usable for real communication. i tried both google play and f-droid versions, but neither version raised any notifications while sending messages in chat and starting video or voice only conversations from another account and phone. I guess I will have to set up a jabber server which has decent enough integration with nextcloud and notifications there are no problem.

As the other reviews said. Shame since this would have been the nail in the coffin for all other groupwares. Basic Issues: -Cannot use web and app at same time -file links to web even when nextcloud app installed -feels like a web wrapper instead of an actual app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The latest releases adds many new features, like files and comes with a fresh design.

google_play_reviews.content: Message push notifications are okay. But audio or video call Notification is totally not working. Hope you guys will fix it soon.
It's good, but has a way to go . Basic functionally still missing . Need ability to allow users without a full blown account on Nextcloud.
Great
THis app is a beta version at best. No notifications work in web browsers or android apps. They keep announcing new, irrelevant features rather than making the basic functionality work.
How to chose different ringtones? How increase volume and somebody call me ?
nice, pretty slick and easy to use.
No incoming notication. Only way to pick up the incoming call is to call them back when they are calling. The flow isnt right on this.
I wished the app could handle authentication using the "main" Nextcloud app, the same way the News applications does : it avoids entering a huge dedicated token manually
Chat load initially and then loads again for the 2nd time to appear everything twice
This app seems to work well. One bug: when the keyboard pops up on screen to reply to a message, part of the top "bar" slides up under the status bar.
Behind a NAT and using a turnserver test calls were OK.
Self hosted im, voice and video calls and it works! Amazing! Eat s@!% Google.
Works flawlessly on a raspberry pi

it works well except emojis, when I want to send any emoji only question marks will be shown up (Android to Android, Android to Webapp) :/ and of course DB uses utf8mb update: thanks for answer but it's not a database issue, that's fine, utf8mb everywhere
google_play_reviews.replyContent: This really seems like a database problem uh :( On the web though it requires that you have certain fonts, so not much we can do there :( Cheers, Mario (mario@nextcloud.com)

google_play_reviews.content: Well done guys. You're making the app better and better

it is working, on nc17, installed on Synology ds218+. I like that it is working after installing turn server, even outside of home network. however are some area where needs improvement: no notification status, I need sometimes to call twice, there is no clear status for the responder if it is a video call or standard audio call, if one user is hanging up, the other side still remains connected. that's why I give only 4 stars.

While the app is technically "as described", it's barely useful in it's current state. The ethos of the developer seems to be that basic functionality is not required. No attachments from your phone (been "in development" for years now). Voice calls are sketchy, and randomly disconnect or are poor quality. Social interactions like GIFs aren't supported. Federation is not supported (another "in development" feature). This app is a wasted opportunity. I WANTED this to be good...

Running NC 17 and trying this on multiple platforms/devices. Android app is better than iOS app. Notifications seem a bit more reliable on iOS though. Biggest thing preventing me from using it is unable to send locally stored files (photos videos etc) - can only send files stored in the cloud. Also would be nice to be able to respond directly from notification shade. Keeps getting better from what I can see. Keep it up with matching features for other alternatives (telegram) and I will switch.

Am hopeful that in the near future, calls will work. Last update shows that watch and Android 10 notifications should be fixed. Still no notifications on Samsung Active 2. Calls work, but no notification of incoming call which sort of defeats the purpose. Chat messages are working with notifications. Installed latest update 2-13-2020. Samsung S9+ running Android 10. I am willing to help beta test (run my own nextcloud server on unraid).
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the issues. I assume that the call notification work on your phone, but not on the watch? Can you confirm please? mario@nextcloud.com and let's fix this! :)

google_play_reviews.content: Dead on arrival. Installing this on my phone added the app to my home screen. But I can't launch it. I guess it's not compatable with android 9? -- edit: upon reinstall it worked as expected. Not sure why there was something janky with my previous install.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It should work just fine - absolutely never had an issue where it wouldn't lunch. Can you get a stacktrace? Cheers, Mario

google_play_reviews.content: Out of 5 devices (including samsung and lenovo), the only phone where I can see notifications is Samsung S10. Guys, this problem has been known for years. Whatsapp and Skype don't have this program. Even bloody stupid games like angry birds are able to send unnecessary notifications. So what's wrong that you can't program it properly in this app?
perfect and fast easy to use ü•∞
